pkgmetadata.longdescription: # trieresThis is a python module enabling the remote execution of accelerated functions on the [cloudFPGA platform](https://www.zurich.ibm.com/cci/cloudFPGA/).## Workflow to upload a new package at pypi```git clone --depth 1 --recursive git@github.com:cloudFPGA/trieres.gitcd trieres make envsource venv/bin/activatemake dist make upload```## NotesOptionally to crate a new package by using the latest cFp_Zoo :```git clone --depth 1 --recursive git@github.com:cloudFPGA/trieres.gitcd trieres make envsource venv/bin/activatecd trieres/cFp_Zoogit pullmake dist make upload```
